collection.description: Early European caricatures and depictions of Africa and Africans in French periodicals. Such materials should be viewed in the context of the time and place in which they were created. The images are presented as specific, original artifacts recording the attitudes, perspectives and beliefs of a different era. Related URL connects to the whole publication.
collection.title: Depictions of Africa in French humour magazines
